tagline: Systematic security assessment with threat modeling, compliance mapping, and actionable remediation
pros: Bridges technical security and business compliance — speaks both languages fluently
Threat modeling that identifies risks before code is written
Reports that non-technical stakeholders can act on, with CVSS scoring and compliance mapping
Systematic approach covering code, config, architecture, and dependencies
cons: Audits are point-in-time — doesn't provide continuous security monitoring
Doesn't implement fixes or build features
Deep exploitation and red teaming belong to the Penetration Tester

model_recommendations.notes: Complex reasoning, architecture, security, or financial analysis. Needs the best available model with full thinking/reasoning enabled.
